What is (are) Castleman disease ?,"Castleman disease (CD) is a rare condition that affects the lymph nodes and related tissues. There are two main forms: unicentric CD and multicentric CD. Unicentric CD is a ""localized"" condition that is generally confined to a single set of lymph nodes, while m
